item.title: Azure Installation
item.description: 1. Create a Microsoft Azure Integration Card From the top navigation menu, select Integrations. Click the Microsoft Azure card. In a separate, new tab, open the Azure portal. The following instructions were created using the Azure portal not the classic portal. Instructions vary depending on which portal youâ€™re using. 2. Create an Active Directory Application in Azure Once in the Azure portal, click Azure Active Directory from the left side menu.
